title: yahoo62278
author: yahoo62278
content: I have a contact looking to get in touch with NLNico regarding Dicesites.com. Does anyone have a way to contact Nico? I have looked all over Dicesites.com and anywhere it says contact us there is nothing. No email address, no phone number, and no live support. Anyone who can get me in touch, send me a pm please. Thank you.

comments.author: LoyceV
comments.body: At the risk of stating the obvious: PM? He may use email notification. Or try to email info@domain.

comments.author: Eternad
comments.body: Quote from: LoyceV on May 19, 2023, 11:10:17 AMAt the risk of stating the obvious: PM? He may use email notification. Or try to email info@domain.PM is not possible since the user last active was October 2020 while his last post is on 2019. He doesn’t leave any contact info besides his ANN thread. His thread receives a lot of pending request like this.@Yahoo, maybe you can try contacting the registrant info on his domain registration. Here’s his who.is result.https://who.is/whois/dicesites.com

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: You can also try admin@dicesites.com its the most common admin contact info, but there's no guarantee that it is the right contact info, you can try sending him a private message we all know that when we sent a message it will land on the email we're using here in Bitcointalk, he'll get a notification and he is active in reading his email he'll get a notification.

comments.author: yahoo62278
comments.body: Quote from: LoyceV on May 19, 2023, 11:10:17 AMAt the risk of stating the obvious: PM? He may use email notification. Or try to email info@domain.I didn't go the PM route as I saw he hadn't logged in for years here. I'll give that a shot along with everyone else's suggestions. I thought surely someone on here would have his contact info though. Thanks for the suggestions @all.
